name: Nycil Germ Expert Classic Prickly Heat Powder 150gm
description: Clinically proven germ-fighting formula for summer skin protection
composition: Dugdh Pasan (68.04 Gm) + Jasad Bhasma (5 Gm) + Makhya Satva (25 Gm) + Mentha Arvensis (0.5 Gm) + Neem Tails (Azadirachta Indica Oil) (0.5 Ml)
productHighlights: Clinically proven germ-fighting formula | Supports germ-killing for cleaner and healthier skin | Offers 3 visible results for summer skin problems like sweat, body odour, itching, rashes and prickly heat | Contains a unique antibacterial formula that protects from germs causing summer skin issues
productDescription: Nycil Germ Expert Classic Prickly Heat Powder is used for providing visible relief from issues like sweat, body odour, itching, rashes and prickly heat in just three days. With over 50 years of expertise, Nycil remains a leading brand in the prickly heat and cooling powder category in India, offering long-lasting freshness and protection.
ingredients: Starch: Natural absorbent that effectively soaks up excess moisture from the skin | Zinc Oxide: Known for its soothing and protective properties, helps calm irritated skin | Chlorphenesin: Potent antibacterial agent that helps eliminate harmful microbes | Purified Talc: Provides a smooth, cooling effect on the skin

howToUse: Sprinkle powder on the affected area 3-4 times a day or as directed by the physician
safetyInformation: Read the label carefully before use | Keep out of the reach of children | For external use only | Apply only to intact skin surfaces and not to skin wounds and open injuries | Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes | It should not be ingested | Store in a cool and dry place away from direct sunlight
additionalInformation: Good to Know: Topical powder applied topically to reduce rashes | Quick Tips: Apply only to intact skin surfaces, Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes, For external use only, Wash hands after application

name: Indulekha Bringha Oil 100ml
description: Ayurvedic hair oil for managing hair fall and promoting hair growth
composition: Aloe Barbadensis Plant (0.1816 Gm) + Amalaki (0.1816 Gm) + Bacopa Monnieri Extract (0.118 Gm) + Bhringaraj (0.1816 Gm) + Draksh Munnaka (0.1816 Gm) + Glycyrrhiza Glabra Extract (0.0187 Gm) + Kadi Patta Murraya Koengu (0.473 Gm) + Karpoor (0.075 Gm) + Kshiram (0.303 Ml) + Narikela (Cocos Nucifera) (7.5 Ml) + Nimba (0.075 Gm) + Prunus Amygdalus Oil (0.118 Gm) + Tinospora Cordifolia (0.1816 Gm) + Wrightia Ticntoria (1.212 Gm)
productHighlights: Helps manage hair fall | Helps strengthen the hair | Nourishes the hair and scalp | Supports new hair growth | Suitable for men and women
productDescription: Indulekha Bringha Oil 100ml is used for managing hair fall. It is a formulation of Bringhraj, Svetakutaja, Amla and virgin coconut oil. It is an Ayurvedic remedy that helps reduce hair loss and support hair growth. This Ayurvedic oil, which contains Bhringraj and ten other herbs, helps revitalise the roots and supports the growth of new hair.
ingredients: Bringhraj: Key ingredient for herbal preparations used in the management of hair loss | Svetakutaja: Renowned for its anti-dandruff properties due to its moisturising characteristics | Amla: Helps strengthen the hair follicles, allowing for rapid growth | Virgin Coconut Oil: Helps hydrate and moisturise the hair, ensuring that it remains soft and shining
keyUses: Hair Fall Reduction: Potent Ayurvedic preparation that can help manage hair loss | Supports New Hair Growth: Stimulates new hair development through nurturing effects | Provides Essential Nourishment: Combination of natural nutrients penetrate deep into the scalp | Helps Nourish Hair: Virgin coconut oil and aloe vera work as natural conditioner
howToUse: For best results, use three times each week for four months | After applying the oil, wait 3-4 hours before rinsing it out with Indulekha Bringha Shampoo
safetyInformation: Read the label carefully before use | Keep it out of the reach of children | For external use only | Store in a cool and dry place away from direct sunlight
additionalInformation: Good to Know: Free from silicones, Paraben-free, Synthetic perfume free, Sulphate-free | Quick Tips: Leave oil overnight on the scalp, Massage the scalp with fingers in circular motion, Always part the hair to ensure oil reaches the scalp | Concerns It Can Help With: Hair fall, Hair growth, Scalp health
